headline: FirstEnergy Corp (FE) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Financial Performance and ...

headline: FirstEnergy Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: FirstEnergy (NYSE:FE) executives on the company’s fourth-quarter 2025 earnings call highlighted a “transformative” year marked by higher earnings, stepped-up capital spending, improved reliability metrics, and a significantly expanded long-term investment plan aimed at modernizing its electric grid

headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Q4 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: The headline numbers for FirstEnergy (FE) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: New Potomac Edison Substation Delivers More Reliable Power for Berkeley County Customers
summary: Potomac Edison, a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), has completed a new substation in Berkeley County that is already making electric service more reliable for about 2,400 homes and businesses. The new facility uses modern, smart technology to help reduce outages and restore power faster when problems occur.

headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Brian Tierney: Thank you, Karen.  Thank you for joining us today and for your interest in FirstEnergy Corp. 2025 was a transformative year for our company.  K. Jon Taylor: This positions the company to deliver a core earnings per share compounded annual growth rate near the top end of 6% to 8% from 2026 to 2030.
